channel.title: CVE Feed for ifm -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ifm -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3485|2024-08-03T01:14:01.533Z -- ifm -- moneo%20appliance
item.description: In IFM Moneo Appliance with version up to 1.9.3 an unauthenticated remote attacker can reset the administrator password by only supplying the serial number and thus gain full control of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-28747|2024-08-02T00:56:58.150Z -- ifm -- smart%20plc%20ac14xx%20firmware
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use the hard-coded credentials to access the SmartSPS devices with high privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28748|2024-08-02T00:56:58.055Z -- ifm -- smart%20plc%20ac14xx%20firmware
item.description: A remote attacker with high privileges may use a reading file function to inject OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-28750|2024-08-02T00:56:58.039Z -- ifm -- smart%20plc%20ac14xx%20firmware
item.description: A remote attacker with high privileges may use a deleting file function to inject OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-28749|2024-08-02T00:56:58.043Z -- ifm -- smart%20plc%20ac14xx%20firmware
item.description: A remote attacker with high privileges may use a writing file function to inject OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-28751|2024-08-02T00:56:57.962Z -- ifm -- smart%20plc%20ac14xx%20firmware
item.description: An high privileged remote attacker can enable telnet access that accepts hardcoded credentials.
